import React from 'react'; import code from '../assets/code2.png'; import chip8 from '../assets/Chip-8.gif'; import Tron from '../assets/Tron.jpeg'; import Raytracer from '../assets/portfolio2.jpg'; import Rasterizer from '../assets/DualRastizer.gif'; import ExtendoBrawl from '../assets/Extendo.png'; import Heaven3D from '../assets/Heaven-3D.png'; const Works = () => { return (

Work

Check out some of my most recent work

{/* Container */}
{/* Grid Item */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
Chip-8 Emulator

A Chip-8 Emulator built with C++ Visual studio 2022 and SDL as graphics renderer.

{/* */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
TRON

A Tron 2D arcade game built with self made 2D Game engine in C++ and using SDL as a graphics renderer.

{/* */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
Raytracer

A Raytracer built with Visual studio c++ with custom engine.

{/* */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
Rasterizer

A Rasterizer made with visual studio C++ using custom engine.

{/* */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
Extendo-Brawl

Extendo-Brawl local multiplayer game built with Unity Engine.

{/* */}
{/* Hover Effects */}
Heaven-3D

It is a Heven-3D game engine made with C++. It is an ongoing project..

{/* */}
); }; export default Works;
